comments.body: This [seems like it should have more members than this](https://github.com/apostrophecms/apostrophe/blob/master/index.js#L289) and that those members should all be optional. Since you're changing it from `any`, having as many of the members people may have been using as possible it good, since it'll make it less likely we'll break them by making this more typesafe.
Though tbf, you're the definition owner; so if you say this is fine, I'll believe you.
